answers.answer: It sure doesn't sound like a GERD problem to me, but I'm not a health professional.  I'm hoping you can follow up on this, perhaps get insured based on the Affordable Care Act.  Lightheaded feelings can be caused by all sorts of physical problems.  For example, I have Congestive Heart Failure, diabetes and issues with low potassium/sodium at time.  Many years ago I had an anxiety moment that caused me to faint.  I'd broaden my search for an answer.  I have no clues, you need to see a doc for answers.  Keep us informed.

question: Hi I've been diagnosed with GERD. For the past week I've been feeling extreme weird burning hunger feeling. The doctor took me for a blood test about hunger problem I forgot what it was for but the test resulted fine. I now don't have insurance and I am still on the Pill he prescribed me for the GERD. ive been feeling like extreme chest and like I have to cough out some mucus in my throat/chest feeling.  I take every morning and says 30 min before eating food. It seems to help but other problems seem to come out of me.I hope that I post and if anyone know what I am feeling or what is wrong with me. I didn't have these feeling for weeks but now this is new feeling.I have this now weird lightheaded like feeling following with a weird euphoria like rush cold/ feeling in my head. the whole nights I've been dealing with this weird pounding like almost dizzy feeling. Also like my head wont sit still when I try to keep it still. Pulsing to the heart beat. Its hard to sleep that I might get really dizzy or something.In the morning I have a long time bowel movement also. right after like today I feel very hunger again so I ate food and at the time I am eating food I feel like that weird drugged out rush cold/sensations on my head. It is weird and irritating. After eating I feel like the lightheaded ness slightly goes away but it still persists. I feel the dang feeling and I am feeling uneasy. that weird euphoria  I feel slight pressure also in my head.type head sensations is weird and very uncomfortable. I don't use illegal drugs or what not.what's wrong with me please anyone got a clue or similar to this?please anyone got any clues?
title: GERD? hunger weird head sensations.
